relation: I painted this for Stevesesy as a way of saying "thanks" for lending me Mother 3. In case you don't recognize it: http://starmen.net/vote/vote.php?id=1763 Yeah, it's silly, but I had fun making it anyway. I thought it was a hoot.

The idea here was Tomato's, from the EB Art Idea Factory topic in the forums. More or less, it's supposed to be a cross of EarthBound's Caveboy from Stonehenge, Saturday Night Live's "Unfrozen Caveman Lawyer" (played by the late Phil Hartman), and Phoenix Wright. It was made by badly tracing and modifying a Phoenix Wright screenshot. Tomato's words, which made this possible: "Cave Boy as SNL's Unfrozen Caveman Lawyer, in Phoenix Wright style, but using his usual "I'm just a simple caveman" speech."
A commissioned painting of the good Dr. Andonuts. Acrylics on 9"x12" canvas board.
Submission for the Envelope Art part of the 2007 EB Siege.
Submission for the Envelope Art part of the 2007 EB Siege.
